name: jubensha-sdk
description: Multiplayer Online Script Murder Game SDK

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:server && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build:server: esbuild src/server/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server/index.cjs && esbuild src/server/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/server/index.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
